item.description: Hi Everyone!!  Potluck/Movie night!!  Here is hoping for no snow on Fri 3/1  Genetic Roulette the movie noone should miss!  Potluck please bring an organic raw dish enough for 6-8 people.  If you are new and not sure what to bring a salad (fruit or veggie) is always great!  See you soon!

group.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food Meetup Group

item.name: Potluck Friday March 1
